## Assessment infrastructure

-   During the WKBHERMAC (2025), it was decided to use the SAM infrastructure

## Observation data-input, with sample uncertainty

-   Catch-at-age
    -   Ages 2-12+, since 1988
-   IESNS, International Echosystem in the norwegian sea
    -   Ages 3-12+, since 1996
-   IESNS, International Echosystem in the norwegian sea (bartent sea)
    -   Age 2, since 1991
-   BESS, Barents sea echosystem survey
    -   Ages 2-3, since 2004
-   RFID
    -   Ages 3-12+, since 2017
-   NASF, Norwegian acoustic-trawl survey on the spawning growns
    -   Ages 3-12+, year 1988-2008

    -   Ages 3-12+, 2015 - unwards
